About Re-cycle

We offer eco-friendly tours in the Mjøsaregion, collaborating with the local museums, we offer a new aproach to learn about the history of Norways largest lake and its area. You will experience beautiful nature and some of the most scenic routes Oppland and Hedmark can offer you.

Started up in 2019, with the idea of creating something sustainable for our tourists. We took contact with the local museums to plan out routes and what would interest people. Our guides are local and know the area in and out and will provide their knowledge on our trips. We also offer custom trips on order, where you can include and exclude stops of your own wish.

View over Lillehammer
